name: ChopChop [Re-visited]
description:
Welcome to Chop Chop [Re-visited]!

Enter the world of Chop Chop and play as our rookie chef protagonist, Chop Chop, as he tries to free the island from the malicious rule of the Master Chefs. Explore the Veggie Forest and the BBQ Bayou and defeat the ruling chefs in combat.

Instructions:

WASD - Move 

Shift - Sprint

Left MB - Attack

Space - Jump & Advance Dialogue

Right MB - Move Camera

Chop Chop Dev Team: 

Design - Jaime B., Johan R., & Ryan N.

Programming - Jessi, Isabelle T.

Story - Larenz H., Caroline M.

Art - Yemisi A., Ashanti A., Dain N.

Sound - Ben T.
